run.lit: LuxRender Textures to be included in Reality 3
This class of texture is used for light-emitting materials
This should be called the texture "class"
Should we call this the "strength"? Or "power"?
What parameters? Is there a way to make it more user friendly?
Float format so that it can be fractional
Coming parameter for all textures. It can be one of:
Visually this one is represented by a gradient with multiple sliders. The point where each slider is is represented by the "offset" parameter. Will need custom widget to be represented on screen.
textures: arrays of colors or textures
Can be also and array of color
Unify. A mix is just a multimix with two elements
type: string, one of "default"/"color". Set it to "default"
Internally called "blender_marble" We don't use Lux's own marble texture, it's limited.
